CustomProfile.Description: Sailor Zombie: AKB48 Arcade Edition is a light‑gun game by Bandai Namco where members of the AKB48 idol group take on hordes of zombies. Built on the PlayStation 3‑based System 357 hardware and presented in a closed‑theater cabinet, the game has players shoot zombies while interacting with video footage of the idols. It mixes pop‑idol charm with frantic zombie‑blasting action for a unique arcade experience.
